title: fix(ui): add cursor-pointer to select all buttons
author: fisventurous

gist.summary: Added the pointer cursor style to selection and toggle buttons in the account permissions UI.
gist.impact: Users will now see the correct interactive cursor when hovering over these controls, improving usability.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art close-up of a tiny 8-bit bee clicking a 'Select All' button with a large pixel mouse cursor. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Unpacking. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
